## Property Descriptions

<a id="SphereMesh_property_height"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **height** = `1.0` [ğŸ”—](#SphereMesh_property_height)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_height**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_height**\ (\ )

Full height of the sphere.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SphereMesh_property_is_hemisphere"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **is_hemisphere** = `false` [ğŸ”—](#SphereMesh_property_is_hemisphere)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_is_hemisphere**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_is_hemisphere**\ (\ )

If ``true``, a hemisphere is created rather than a full sphere.

\ **Note:** To get a regular hemisphere, the height and radius of the sphere must be equal.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SphereMesh_property_radial_segments"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **radial_segments** = `64` [ğŸ”—](#SphereMesh_property_radial_segments)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radial_segments**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_radial_segments**\ (\ )

Number of radial segments on the sphere.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SphereMesh_property_radius"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **radius** = `0.5` [ğŸ”—](#SphereMesh_property_radius)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_radius**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_radius**\ (\ )

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="SphereMesh_property_rings"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [int](int.md) **get_rings**\ (\ )
